item.title: Heatwave Warning Karnataka: Health Minister urges precautions as IMD issues heatwave warning for north interior Karnataka, ET HealthWorld
item.description:

Raichur: With the India Meteorological Department (IMD) issuing a warning about a temperature rise from March 15 to 19 over north Interior Karnataka, Health Minister Dinesh Gundu Rao on Saturday urged people to take precautionary measures and avoid traveling outside between 1...]]>
